fields.summary: The default value of io.compression.codec.lzo.buffersize should not be in the core-site-default.xml file.
fields.description:
The default value of io.compression.codec.lzo.buffersize should not be in the core-site-default.xml file.

The io.compression.codec.lzo.buffersize configuration file is the core configuration file of LZO. The default value is 245 MB. The default value should be controlled by ZLO and should not be contained in the core-site file.

 

!image-2025-05-12-16-21-43-114.png!
